DOC.brief_summary: This study hop improve early detection ovarian cancer . It determine woman bloat , abdominal distension , abdominal/pelvic pain , increase urinary frequency and/or early satiety , benefit earlier surgery screen CA-125 ovarian cancer biomarker transvaginal ultrasound .
DOC.brief_title: DOvEE - Diagnosing Ovarian & Endometrial Cancer Early
DOC.criteria: 1 . Sign approve informed consent form ( ICF ) . 2 . Be ≥ 50 year age . 3 . Have least one symptom outline period ≥2 week ≤ 1 year : Feeling full eating bite , loss appetite Diarrhoea , constipation , bowel rectum feel full , change bowel habit , constant urge bowel movement , painful burn bowel movement , rectal pain , painful defecation Bloating , distension abdomen , clothes around waist feel tight , feel abdominal mass Weight loss diet Nausea , vomiting , heartburn , gas , burping , indigestion Increased urinary frequency , need urinate urgently , pressure bladder , leak urine , burn sensation urinating , need urinate unable , unable empty bladder completely , feel full urinating Vaginal discharge , bleeding , spot , deep pain intercourse Discomfort pain abdomen , pelvic region , low back 4 . Subjects must willing comply study protocol 1 . Previous bilateral salpingooophorectomy ( BSO ) 2 . Previous diagnosis cancer ovary , fallopian tube , peritoneum 3 . Current bleed per rectum , due haemorrhoid 4 . Current frank haematuria 5 . Symptoms suggest need urgent clinical evaluation outside research protocol
